answers.answer: You need to talk to a doctor this is signs of preeclampsia
Ok thank you. I went to the doctor earlier and my blood pressure was ok and I had no calcium in my urine. How fast can that usually happen?
You might just be retaining water. Make sure to elevate your feet and take walks to get your blood circulation going.

question: At first just my ankles were swollen now everything is. My legs arms fingers. Is this normal? I've been watching my sodium in take just a little worried
title: so swollen
